title: Recursive Fibonacci Sequence Generator (Hard)
description:
Write a recursive function called `fib` that generates the nth number of the Fibonacci sequence.

#### Function Signature
```python
def fib(n: int) -> int:
```

#### Input
- `n` (int): The position of the Fibonacci number to generate, starting from 0.

#### Output
- Returns the nth Fibonacci number as an integer.
